channel.title: Tobin Zolkowski — Writing
channel.description: Data journalism by Tobin Zolkowski. Finding human stories in datasets.

item.title: You're Probably 5 Bad Days Away From Becoming a Monster
item.description: I spent three weeks reading genocide research. I didn't sleep well. What I found was a chilling reality about human nature.

item.title: The Man Who Filled a Ditch With Babies Sold Engagement Rings for 30 Years
item.description: He died peacefully at 80. The helicopter pilot who stopped him got death threats. That tells you everything about us.

item.title: What Young Women Saw That Young Men Didn't
item.description: I revisited Gallup's tracking data from 1999. Young men aren't really going anywhere—it's young women who have moved.

item.title: How Are Americans Actually Affording and Buying Groceries Right Now
item.description: I spend my days analyzing data. The numbers say people are getting destroyed at the grocery store.
